head.title: Camp
head.intro: [Camp](https://github.com/espadrine/sc/) is a Node.js web server framework. This guide targets Camp v17.x.

body.elms:
```js

```

See: [Templates](https://github.com/espadrine/sc/blob/master/doc/Readme.md#templates)
